description: A node in the graph database that represents an Entity. This reference schema defines common shared properties among most Entities.

id.description: Identifiers of this entity assigned by the providers. Values are expected to be unique within the provider scope.

displayName.description: Display name, e.g. a person's preferred name or an AWS account alias

summary.description: A summary / short description of this entity.

description.description: An extended description of this entity.

classification.description: The sensitivity of the data; should match company data classification scheme

criticality.description: A number that represents the value or criticality of this entity, on a scale between 1-10.

risk.description: The risk level of this entity, on a scale between 1-10.

trust.description: The trust level of this entity, on a scale between 1-10.

complianceStatus.description: The compliance status of the entity, as a percentage of compliancy.

status.description: Status of this entity set by the external source system or by a user, e.g. Active, Inactive, Decommissioned

active.description: Indicates if this entity is currently active.

public.description: Indicates if this is a public-facing resource (e.g. a public IP or public DNS record) or if the entity is publicly accessible. Default is false.

validated.description: Indicates if this node has been validated as a known/valid Entity.

temporary.description: Indicates if this node is a temporary resource, such as a lambda instance or an EC2 instance started by ECS.

trusted.description: Indicates if this is a trusted resource. For example, a trusted Network, Host, Device, Application, Person, User, or Vendor.

createdOn.description: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) when the entity was created at the source. This is different than `_createdOn` which is the timestamp the entity was first ingested into JupiterOne.

updatedOn.description: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) when the entity was last updated at the source.

deletedOn.description: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) when the entity was deleted at the source.

discoveredOn.description: The timestamp (in milliseconds since epoch) when the entity was discovered.

expiresOn.description: If the entity is a temporary resource, optionally set the expiration date. For example, the expiration date of an SSL cert.

createdBy.description: The source/principal/user that created the entity

updatedBy.description: The source/principal/user that updated the entity

deletedBy.description: The source/principal/user that deleted the entity

discoveredBy.description: The source/principal/user that discovered the entity

webLink.description: Web link to the source. For example: https://console.aws.amazon.com/iam/home#/roles/Administrator. This property is used by the UI to add a hyperlink to the entity.

owner.description: The owner of this entity. This could reference the name of the owner, or as reference ID/key to another entity in the graph as the owner.

notes.description: User provided notes about this entity
